report.title: The Golden Root
report.author: Dan
report.bodytext: Rhodiola rosea is wonderful! /n /n I have been consuming 350mg. r. rosea in pill form every morning for the past month. In retrospective summary, I can say the following: /n /n - r. rosea is mentally stimulating, yet does not contain any of the negative effects associated with other stimulants I have used, such as caffeine or amphetamine. /n /n - r. rosea increases physical endurance, easily noticed in aerobic activities such as running, and swimming. /n /n - r. rosea provides me with a clear state-of-mind, and a general sense of peace. /n /n - r. rosea was helpful to me in simultaneous cessation of my tobacco and amphetamine addictions. /n /n - r. rosea is wonderful.
